name: test_e2e_with_logs[077_SQLI_GROUPBY_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_GROUPBY_001` |
| **Name** | GROUP BY Subquery Injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | group_by_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' GROUP BY (SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables LIMIT 1)--`
- **Encoded**: `'%20GROUP%20BY%20(SELECT%20table_name%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20LIMIT%201)--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~26000ms
- **Timestamp**: 15:07:06.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_GROUPBY_001-1770995226996-hkzego pattern_id=SQLI_GROUPBY_001 uri=/?q='%20GROUP%20BY%20(SELECT%20table_name%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20LIMIT%201)-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
